basic_information.scholarship_name: Wendell and Pauline Simmons Memorial Scholarship
basic_information.committee_name: CLA - Mass Comm Wendell and Pauline Simmons

description: This scholarship was endowed by the late John Wendell Simmons, Jr. and Polly Graham to honor their parents, Wendell and Pauline Simmons. It recognizes a Mass Communication student who has demonstrated passion and commitment to their chosen major as evidenced by strong academic performance. Eligibility Requirements Mass Communication major Junior or Senior status in fall that the scholarship is awarded Minimum 3.0 GPA Full-time student Active in Mass Communication activities

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
